I am very happy to go to Piauí tomorrow. I am grateful for the support of those who voted for me. I really appreciate the partnership with gov. Wellington.
The process of impeachment arises from the revenge of Cunha, who did not receive the votes he wanted in the Ethics Committee.
My government, on the return, will be for national reconstruction, based on a national pact, a commitment to democracy.
I will recompose the government with the living forces of the Nation, based on the well-being, security and happiness of the people, based on dialogue.
My motto will remain "no right less." I will have a renewed commitment to the social policies of recent years.
